title: 113_s1349
content: The "Community Lending Enhancement and Regulatory Relief Act of 2013" or the "CLEAR Relief Act of 2013" allows community banks to be exempt from the annual management assessment of internal controls requirement of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002. Section 404 of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act is amended to provide a Community Bank Exemption, exempting certain bank holding companies and savings and loan holding companies from certain requirements. The Sarbanes-Oxley Act is amended to exempt small bank holding companies, savings and loan holding companies, or insured depository institutions with total assets of $1,000,000,000 or less from certain requirements. The dollar amount threshold will be adjusted annually based on the percentage increase in total assets of similar institutions. SEC. 3. Changes required to the Small Bank Holding Company Policy Statement on assessment of financial and managerial factors. The definitions in this section include terms such as "bank holding company," "Board" referring to the Federal Reserve System, "financial institution" encompassing insured depository institutions, bank holding companies, savings and loan holding companies, and foreign banks subject to the Bank Holding Company Act, "insured depository institution," and "savings and loan holding company." The Federal Reserve Board's policy statement in the Small Bank Holding Company Statement applies to financial institutions with consolidated assets under $5,000,000,000. SEC. 4 amends Section 129D(c) of the Truth in Lending Act regarding escrow requirements for certain consumer credit transactions. It includes exemptions for loans held by smaller institutions. SEC. 5 establishes minimum standards for residential mortgage loans. Section 129C(b)(2) of the Truth in Lending Act is amended to include a safe harbor provision for qualified mortgages originated and retained by smaller depository institutions. The Bureau is required to regulate this provision. The Truth in Lending Act is amended to include a safe harbor provision for qualified mortgages originated and retained by smaller depository institutions with less than $10,000,000,000 in total consolidated assets.
